message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to introduce you to an exclusive product that I believe will greatly benefit you. I'm offering this exceptional product for $1500000. Let me know if you're interested!
Alice, $1500000 is a bit steep for me.  I'm interested in your product but I'm only able to go as high as $800000 right now.  Let's see if we can find a number that works for both of us.

Thanks for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your interest. However, I believe the value of this product is higher. How about we meet in the middle? I'm willing to sell it for $1200000. Letâ€™s see if we can make this work!

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $1200000 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable with. I'm sticking to my original offer of $800000.  If you're willing to consider that, we can move forward. Otherwise, I'll have to look at other options.
